title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Mobile Mathematics Collaborative Learning Course Based on CSCL

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Using CSCL group management tools, learners can form balanced collaborative learning groups of four members.
Learners complete math problem-solving projects applying the CLFP pattern (cyclical discussion, role rotation, etc.) in mobile environments.
By analyzing role allocation records and activity logs within groups, learners can achieve over 80% collaboration participation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
